__e: Everybody get a drink, find a person.
So I see. Well, give yourself a drink and help 'em find the tables.
Charm him, slim him a mickey and when he's groggy, you clean him out.
Oh, yes? I'm saving up to be apprenticed to a Mayfair salon.
Well, yes, not the finest potable in creation, I grant.
"The drink that makes you want to kill yourself instantly."
